title: Atlantis: Quest
description: ASIN B00E5LZACS moved to the most recent edition hereIn the year two thousand thirty-three, the world changed. The computer grid mysteriously collapsed plunging the world's governments into chaos. Flying metal orbs appeared dominating the skies while enforcing curfew on a hapless people. Governments were helpless to respond and taking credit for it all: The Prophet. In the small town of Melvin's Bank, Belize, a professor perfects time travel, and Jack Spencer is the first living thing on Earth to survive a Jump through time. They see an opportunity to use Jack’s unique ability to confront The Prophet hidden ten thousand years in the past on an island called Atlantea. The Prophet will be a formidable foe. Able to Jump time as well, the cowled Prophet has learned the secrets of ancient alchemy and mixed them with the weaponry of another time and is hell-bound to destroy the future. Only Jack can stop him, and it all builds to a dramatic conclusion that will keep you guessing until the revealing ending. Jack’s adventures conclude in Atlantis: War Atlantea, threatened with annihilation from the war machine of the Karion race, calls upon Jack Spencer to save their people and island but can he save both?
author: Calvin C. Cahail
